title: MIUI X5 HD ApexNovaADW Theme v2.1.0 (Alien)
description:
MIUI X5 HD Apex/Nova/ADW Theme v2.1.0

Requirements:Andorid 2.2 and up

Overview: MIUI X5 HD Theme for Apex Launcher, Nova Launcher, ADW Launcher, Holo Launcher, Go Launcher, Atom Launcher and many other Launcher

We presenting you the most compatible Multi Launcher Theme in the Play Store. Based on the new Icon style of Miui V5 we offer you more than 700 ICONS for the most known Launcher. This time all Icons come in HD quality, which guarantee an impressive look on all devices. Moreover, we created some special design elements for Apex and Go Launcher.
A big thanks goes to PhysX, zipalign and the Miui Community at XDA and EN Miui Forum.

>>>>>>>>> FEATURES <<<<<<<<<<<
+ over 700 Icons ( Version 1.0.0 )
+ HD Icons for XHDPI Devices
+ Special Design Elements for Go/Apex Launcher
+ New App Drawer Design (Go Launcher)
+ 4 cool Wallpapers
+ Nova Launcher compatible 
+ Apex Launcher compatible 
+ Holo Launcher compatible 
+ ADW Launcher compatible 
+ Atom Launcher compatible 
+ Go Launcher compatible (User with problems, please send me an Email)

>>>>>>>>> INSTRUCTION <<<<<<<<<<<
1. click in the Play Store on download and install the Theme
2. click on the Theme Icon in your Launcher and scroll to the bottom 
3. here you will find an instruction for every Launcher

What's New

- MEGA USER REQUEST UPDATE

- 30-40 Actvity Namen fixt
